message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this exceptional product at a price of $1200000. It's a unique opportunity and a valuable addition for the right owner. I look forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market and my budget. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $600000 is below what I can accept. This product holds significant value, and I'm willing to lower my initial offer slightly to $1000000. I believe this price reflects the product's true worth and will be a valuable investment for you.

Hi Alice, thank you for reconsidering and lowering your price. I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, but I'm still a bit short of your asking price. I'd like to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your current offer. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
